katelyn.title: Katelyn Belyea
katelyn.description: Katelyn Belyea is a Massachusetts-based multi-instrumentalist and singer who has been involved with music for 10 years. Although she studies classical saxophone at URI on top of seeking her Music Therapy degree, she is proficient on piano, guitar and voice too, with several performances to her name. She was selected to participate in the SEMSBA Festival, and led many musical groups such as Tonal Eclipse Acapella Group and fronted her high school Marching Band.
